jp_text: まあ 気楽にやろうぜ～！

en_text: Don't act like you're really in space.
jp_text: この中を宇宙だと思うな｡
ＯＫ ジョン サンキュー｡

en_text: We're dropping you in the pool, Hibito.
jp_text: プールに降ろすぞ ヒビト！
google_translated: I will get down to the pool Hibito!

jp_text: ストップ！中止だ！止めろ！
こっち 早く！急げ！
すぐにヘルメットを外せ！

en_text: I'm going to find a way to get rid of this disorder.
jp_text: この変な症状…必ず治します｡

en_text: Tell my family, particularly my brother...
jp_text: うちの家族 特に兄には…｡
了解した｡医師連中にも➡
google_translated: I understand. Even in the doctor

en_text: Lots of Japanese tourists are here due to NASA.
jp_text: 日本人観光客が いっぱいいるよ｡
google_translated: There are a lot of Japanese tourists.

jp_text: あ…ほんとだ｡➡
アニメの影響もありますもんね！
google_translated: There is also an influence of anime!

jp_text: 《シャロン 実は俺…》

en_text: I might not get to return to the moon.
jp_text: 《もしかしたら もう 月へは…》
《言えるわけねえか…》
ヒビトも 闘ってるのね｡
大丈夫 わかってる｡➡

en_text: How's it going on your end?
jp_text: そっちは どうだ？
あ…そうなの｡

en_text: The body's light because the brass keeps asking us to minimize the weight.
jp_text: 言われた末の➡

en_text: Can someone explain that to them?
jp_text: だれか 彼らに説明してあげて！
《つまりは 200億円か…》
google_translated: "In other words, it is 20 billion yen ..."

jp_text: 実際には そうでもなかったな｡

en_text: Hey, that'll put us over budget.
jp_text: コストオーバーでしょ？➡

en_text: We'd end up with a vehicle that sends sand flying everywhere...
jp_text: 大迷惑な乗り物の完成だ～｡
google_translated: It is the completion of a big annoying vehicle.

en_text: Remember the flying car I designed that was scrapped?
jp_text: 俺が昔 大ボツくらった
google_translated: I used to be a long time ago

jp_text: えっ!?いや それはまぁ…｡
《どーしよ まだ根にもってたら》

en_text: Been a long time. yeah, it's been a long time.
jp_text: あ お久しぶりです｡
google_translated: Oh, it's been a long time.

jp_text: うん結果オーライだよね うん｡
《これはチャンスだ》

en_text: Oh, you mean the lunar rover! I knew that!
jp_text: あっローバーね！だと思った！
google_translated: Oh, there is a raw bag!I thought so!

jp_text: あぁ 男に二言はノーだ！
あ もしも～し南波で～す｡
google_translated: Oh yestero ~ and it is southwood.

en_text: Scary. well, to be honest, i'd love to send both brothers to the moon.
jp_text: まぁ本当のことを言うと➡
google_translated: Well, if you say the real thing

en_text: Hibito will only feel more pressure,
jp_text: ヒビトの焦りと不安をあおり➡

en_text: I think they have it backward.
jp_text: 俺は逆だと思いますけどね｡
ああ今 行く｡

en_text: Last week, your Mutta and Peter were wanting to make a presentation...
jp_text: 先週あたりから噂のムッタと➡
google_translated: Mutta of rumor from last week and ➡

en_text: It'll probably be shot down. care to join me?
jp_text: 君も行くか？
ふん ずいぶん強気だな｡

en_text: Well, I can't make any promises.
jp_text: まぁ そんな約束はできんが｡
google_translated: Well, that promise is not good.

jp_text: ニンジン食べる？
ここに居るらしいんだ
うわぁコウモリとかヤダ！
あっ！おいヒビット！
どうした？ん？
君達が来るのは分かっていたよ｡
私は鼻がきくんでな｡
軽っ！
